articles.title: Russian Hacking Cartel Attacks Costa Rican Government Agencies - The New York Times
articles.description: Experts who track the hackers’ actions said the group had recently begun to shift its focus to countries in Central and South America, perhaps as retaliation against nations that have supported Ukraine.

articles.author: Michelle Cullen
articles.title: Common skin condition that could be early sign of Parkinson's disease - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The American Parkinson's Disease Association (APDA) says Seborrheic Dermatitis is "commonly found in people" with Parkinson's disease
articles.content:
Parkinson's disease is a progressive nervous system disorder that affects movement that affects thousands of Irish people.
